speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Mr Proinsias De Rossa and Mr José Albino Silva Peneda, on behalf of the Committee on Employment and Social Affairs, on a European Social Model for the future [ 2005/2248(INI) ] ( A6-0238/2006 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Mr Proinsias De Rossa and Mr José Albino Silva Peneda, on behalf of the Committee on Employment and Social Affairs, on a European Social Model for the future [ 2005/2248(INI) ] ( A6-0238/2006 ).
agenda_item: A European social model for the future (debate)
